summary: The X-Men movies are about a team of superheroes with special powers. They were made by 20th Century Fox and Marvel, starting in 2000. The series has many movies, including the original trilogy, spin-offs like the Wolverine and Deadpool films, and prequels. Some movies were very popular and got awards. The series made a lot of money, over $7 billion! After Disney bought Fox, the X-Men joined the Marvel Cinematic Universe, and a new film, *Deadpool & Wolverine*, will come out in 2024.
title: X-Men (film series)
